msContents.summary: Fragments of Exodus (chapter 1:1-8:5) written in Arabic characters.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Arabic Naskhi script of c10th century.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Museum from him on 8 July 1882: inscribed folio [22v].
